title: FS: Lajoie Batting Old Mill PSA 4
author: txaggie00

posts.post_title: FS: Lajoie Batting Old Mill PSA 4
posts.post_content:
Price drop from $3500 to $3000 to more closely align with a PSA 4 copy that recently sold in the REA Summer Auction for $3120.

Other recent sales of this Lajoie front/back combo have been an SGC 3 at Mile High on 4/1/22 for $2035 and a PSA 5 at Heritage on 4/14/22 for $5160.

Expedited shipping with buyer's preferred carrier included in sales price.
PayPal Goods-Services preferred payment method.

Please email me at [url]alstonjb@aol.com[/url] if interested or with questions.

Thanks!
John is a good guy and he owns nice cards- Trent King

Thanks Trent!

Originally offered in trade, Lajoie now for sale.
